explains: adj. 改良主义的，改革派的

sentences.en: But by then, less appealing traits had trumped his reformist leanings.
sentences.cn: 但在那时，一些较少为人注意的特征也损害了其改革者形象。

sentences.en: But third-place finisher Mehdi Karroubi, a reformist cleric, challenged that result.
sentences.cn: 但是得票位居第三的改革派教士迈赫迪·卡鲁比对这个结果提出挑战。

sentences.en: By no Western standards could the patriarch be described as an enlightened or reformist figure.
sentences.cn: 没有西方的标准可以把这位大主教评为开明的或者是改革派的人物。
